description: A creature's eyes and snout emerge from the water, looking upwards with contented calm. Perched precariously on a leaf above is an insect, vibrating with apparent alarm and looking down at the water creature. The creature's peaceful expression and implied enjoyment of its environment stand in stark, ironic contrast to the insect's situation. This juxtaposition highlights the absurd reality where one creature's serene experience of "life" is contingent upon another's impending demise. The tranquil pond setting masks a hidden predatory dynamic, adding a layer of dark humor to the scene.
caption: "Ahhhh ... life!"
